resourceName.description: the name of the string resource holding the settings dictionary in this WorkspaceDb

dbName.description: the name of the database within its cloud container. If not present, defaults to 'workspace-db'.

baseUri.description: the baseUri for the container, without trailing slash (e.g., https://containers.itwinjs.org)

containerId.description: the containerId of this cloud container. Usually a Guid

description.description: information about what is in this workspace

loadingHelp.description: in case there is a problem loading this workspace, show this message

isPublic.description: whether the cloud container is public (doesn't require authentication)

prefetch.description: if true, pre-fetch all of the data from the cloud in the background

syncOnConnect.description: if false, do not attempt to synchronize with cloud when workspace is loaded
